pullRequest.title: CB-1141 & CB-5159: Add high availability options to FreeIPA
pullRequest.bodyText:
Simplified AWS FreeIPA cloud formation template. Some properties were
made optional in the template builder so that unused FreeIPA
properties could be removed. All FreeIPA nodes are gateway nodes, so
the FreeIPA CORE node option was removed.
Fixed the HA logic for the number of processes to use for krb5kdc.
Added a salt hardfail rule when installing FreeIPA.
Added an optional environment property called instancesPerGroup to
specify the number of HA instances of FreeIPA. This property was also
added to the database table.
Rename master group to master0 so that it will accommodate upgrades to
multi AZ in the future which will be named master0, master1, etc.
Added validation checks to allow for up to 4 instances.
Tested manually with a local deployment of cloudbreak by deploying an
HA cluster in Azure and AWS.
Closes #CB-1141
Closes #CB-5159

beforeCommit.message:
CB-1141 & CB-5159: Add high availability options to FreeIPA

Simplified AWS FreeIPA cloud formation template. Some properties were
made optional in the template builder so that unused FreeIPA
properties could be removed. All FreeIPA nodes are gateway nodes, so
the FreeIPA CORE node option was removed.

Fixed the HA logic for the number of processes to use for krb5kdc.

Added a salt hardfail rule when installing FreeIPA.

Added an optional environment property called instancesPerGroup to
specify the number of HA instances of FreeIPA. This property was also
added to the database table.

Rename master group to master0 so that it will accommodate upgrades to
multi AZ in the future which will be named master0, master1, etc.

Added validation checks to allow for up to 4 instances.

Tested manually with a local deployment of cloudbreak by deploying an
HA cluster in Azure and AWS.
